summary.span: 用於選取型別的控制項。

span.span: A control used for selecting a type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以用命令方式或宣告方式使用。 can be used imperatively or declaratively. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 TypePresenter 自訂活動設計工具中。The following code example demonstrates how to use TypePresenter in a custom activity designer. 它會 TypePresenter 控制項繫結至對應的活動，活動設計工具的"Text"屬性。It binds the TypePresenter control to the "Text" property of the corresponding activity of the activity designer. "Text"屬性屬於類型"System.Type"。The "Text" property is of type "System.Type". ## Examples ```xaml ```

summary.span: 取得或設定用來顯示型別的篩選條件。

span.span: Gets or sets the filter used to show types.

value.span: 具有一個傳回值和一個布林值的委派，這個委派表示用來顯示型別的篩選條件。

span.span: A delegate with one return value and a Boolean value that represents the filter used to show types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，下列型別會顯示在型別展示器/型別瀏覽器By default, the following types are shown in the type presenter/type browser 1. 專案系統案例Project system case 1. 參考組件/專案中的所有公用型別All public types in referenced assemblies/projects 2. 目前專案中的所有公用型別All public types in current project 2. 獨立 XAML 案例 （在重新裝載應用程式/檔案未開啟方案，Visual Studio 中開啟的檔案）Standalone XAML case (file in rehosted application/file opened in Visual Studio without solution opened) 1. 已載入 AppDomain 之所有組件中的所有公用型別All public types in all assemblies loaded in the AppDomain 您可以透過設定篩選屬性，將顯示在型別瀏覽器中的型別數目限制為僅適用於您活動的型別。By setting the filter property, you can limit the number of types shown in the type browser to only those types that are valid for your activity.
